description.narrative: The development objective of the Strengthening Hydro-Meteorological Services Project for Haiti is to strengthen the Republic of Haiti’s institutional capacity to provide hydro-meteorological and climate information services customized to the needs of the civil protection and agriculture sectors, which contributes to increasing disaster and climate resilience.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
